author: gregames
msg: core_output_filter: re-instate the deferred_write pool patch so we don't
leak fd's until the end of a keepalive connection.
Jeff Trawick for the original concept
Sander Striker for the mmap ring idea
Cliff Woolley for implementing the above change

author: nd
msg: full clean-up of the auth-docs; feel free to shake out any
- introduce docs for mod_authn_default, mod_authz_default and
- fix argument lists of the provider directives
- fix the examples (intended to be better :)
- mod_authn_anon is now an authn provider

author: jim
msg: Get rid of somewhat long-standing issue regarding large values
of precision causing a buffer to be clobbered in the vformatter

author: bnicholes
msg: Implemented ap_os_default_port() to allow NetWare to resolve the correct
default port based on the request method.  This fixes a problem with URL

author: stoddard
msg: If an httpd.conf has commented out AddModule directives,
apxs -i -a will add an un-commented AddModule directive for
the new module, which breaks the config.
Reviewed by:	Bill Stoddard, Thom May
